Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a 370-foot home run off Rays pitcher Shane Baz in the first inning, giving the Phillies an early 2-0 lead.
Nick Castellanos helped score another run for the Philadelphia Phillies on Weston Wilson’s single in the sixth inning.
The Phillies won 3-2 against the Rays.
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos commented on being hit by a pitch, comparing it to a child throwing a fit.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nick Castellanos is known for hitting home runs during significant or tragic events, and he continued this trend by homering on Patriot Day.
Tampa Bay Rays pitcher Edwin Uceta was suspended for hitting Nick Castellanos with a pitch, and the suspension was later reduced to two games. Rays manager Kevin Cash was also suspended for one game.
